posts.author: CalyTus
posts.body: Hey!Does the game scale well for 2-player? It seems that certain events and the action selection in general seem to be more suited to more players.

posts.author: toerck
posts.body: After my first play with 2 players I thought the game would be for sure better with more players, since two players wasn't very fun.Playing with more players doesn't changed a lot.

posts.author: vjose32
posts.body: Why is the box so big for just some cards? Seems like it could have been half the size imo! Don't understand what it is with companies always making boxes way bigger than they need to be.

posts.author: actaion
posts.body: I agree

posts.author: cicerunner
posts.body: vjose32 wrote:Why is the box so big for just some cards? Seems like it could have been half the size imo! Don't understand what it is with companies always making boxes way bigger than they need to be

posts.author: thorphin
posts.body: How much meat do you have? Neither my single and 5 count meats match the counts in the rulebook…

posts.author: BlackSheep
posts.body: My token counts don't quite match either (for example, I have five extra 20VP tokens). I'm guessing amounts were tweaked after the rulebook was finalised.For example, here's a seller with the same iss

posts.author: thorphin
posts.body: Thanks. Can you list how many of each you actually have?

414685.reason: MESOS近期上榜的主要原因可能是因為其作為一款新遊戲展現出良好的潛力，尤其是在玩家間的討論中，對其遊戲機制及平衡性表現出高度的關注和評價。此外，玩家對於遊戲的擴展性和適應性（如2人遊戲的可行性）也引發了積極的探討，顯示出其在玩家社群中的吸引力和話題性。這些因素共同推動了MESOS的關注度上升，促使其在桌遊榜單上佔據一席之地。

342900.reason: 根據討論串內容，該遊戲《Earthborne Rangers》近期上榜的主要原因可能是因為它是一款具有潛力的新遊戲，雖然存在一些問題和失敗，但仍然吸引了不少玩家的關注和討論。玩家們對於遊戲的故事和玩法表達了興趣，並對其獨特的體驗進行了分享，顯示出遊戲在社群中的活躍度和討論熱度。這些因素共同促成了它在榜單上的上升。

444545.name: Clash of Clans: The Epic Raid

posts.author: cranky_hobbit
posts.body: I saw an advertisement in the past as 1-4 players.Kickstarter has 2-4 players (up to 6 with expansion).So is solo no longer a part of this game/campaign?

threads.title: Is it good or just cash grab?

posts.author: Wildhorn
posts.body: Any gameplay videos by known reviewers?

posts.author: nikmd23
posts.body: Yeah, there isn’t a single video of this thing.With Lang behind it I have to believe it must be okay at a minimum, but the lack of videos makes this pretty difficult to pull the trigger on.

posts.author: Josephus_
posts.body: I was a big CoC player. At my peak I was online around 60 hours a week and was fortunate to be partake in top level league competition. I’m hoping that this is a great production.It’s always tough to

posts.author: tomlikeabomb
posts.body: Eric Lang is one of the designers which gives me high hopes that the game design will be solid. Hopefully Maestro Media can deliver.

posts.author: Josephus_
posts.body: tomlikeabomb wrote:Eric Lang is one of the designers which gives me high hopes that the game design will be solid.I agree. Having Lang involved gives me hope too that the final design could be phenome

444545.reason: 該遊戲近期上榜的主要原因是因為其設計師Eric Lang的知名度引發玩家的高度期待，儘管對於遊戲的實際內容和玩法仍存在不少疑慮和爭議，特別是關於遊戲是否仍然適合單人遊玩以及是否僅僅是一個現金抓取的問題。此外，缺乏遊戲的實際玩法影片進一步增加了玩家的好奇心，促使他們關注該遊戲的發展。這些因素共同推動了遊戲的熱度和討論度。

446892.reason: 該遊戲近期上榜的主要原因可能是因為其Kickstarter活動引起了廣泛的討論與關注，儘管參與者對於活動的質量和內容表達了一些負面看法。這種反應可能吸引了更多玩家的注意，尤其是在擴展內容方面的期待和討論，顯示出該遊戲仍具潛力和市場需求。此外，對於多語言版本的需求也顯示出其在國際市場上的可能性，進一步提升了其關注度。
